Unicron:

"so??"asked Unicron
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: rober=
t riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, November 12, 2004 8:=
01 PM
  Subject: Re: PRisioners of Unicron


  Organics:

  The femme curse=
d and picked up the panel and set it back in place.  She found a repair kit=
 and began repairing the panel.  Once it was working she began working on r=
eadjusting the sensors.  After a few minutes, her scans were now very acura=
te, and so she began scanning again, this time picking up a trail.

  Airly=
 <airly2002@...> wrote:
    Unicron:

    As all answer the door lo=
cks down and a layer of thigh Energhun (the strongest metal in Cybertron) f=
allen down. 

    "Hold your circuits, fair lady" replied the male"First. I=
 didn't knidnapped you!!! Second. remember WHO's in charge and with a word =
I can destroy you and your beloved, third. I WANT RESULTS, those femmes won=
't ran away with out pay their treason and I like the results NOW... Well n=
ow that those points are clear, I suggest you repair this mess and improve =
yourself.."
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: robert riley 
 =
     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, November 12, 2004 7:35=
 PM
      Subject: Re: PRisioners of Unicron


      Organics:

      The f=
emme snarled and pulled the entire console from the wall and threw it at th=
e hologram.  Clearly, she was not happy.

      "How dare you!  First you k=
idnap me, then force me to find my brother with faulty equipment, and now y=
ou punish *ME*?!?!?!  If your minions hadn't have lost him in the first pla=
ce you wouldn't be having this problem.  You want to punish some one, punis=
h that freak clone.  I'll keep looking, but stay off my case, I'm doing eve=
ry thing I can." 





  "NOW... YOU'RE FINISHED! FINAL... FLASH!"
